name: Bouncy Chaos
description:
Life is simple. Life is beautiful. 
You're a bean who wants to survive. 
Stay alive, stay on the plank.

Move with A/D or arrow keys.
Jump with Space (You can even double jump, WAOW!)
Dash with Left Shift.

Thanks for playing! Any feedback is welcome

Please note: Only playable on browser, no mobile controls (yet). Planning on continuing development after Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 is over =)
